pullrequest.title: Add colors and textures to a model

content.raw:
Would it be alright if I skipped addressing this comment? It would take some trial and error to find more distinguishable colors.

When I use brighter colors of the same shade then the final result is uniform color because all the pixels got clipped to 1.0, and if I use different shades then the final result is white so it's still hard to tell where the components came from. I'm sure there is a balance.
content.html:
Would it be alright if I skipped addressing this comment? It would take some trial and error to find more distinguishable colors.

When I use brighter colors of the same shade then the final result is uniform color because all the pixels got clipped to 1.0, and if I use different shades then the final result is white so it's still hard to tell where the components came from. I'm sure there is a balance.
